# rawContent

**Instance Property**

The raw content of the response.

## Declaration

```swift
var rawContent: GeneratedContent
```

## Discussion

When `Content` is `GeneratedContent`, this is the same as `content`.

## Instance Properties

- **content**: The content of the response.
title: rawContent
